name: montreal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a city in southeastern Canada that is the largest city in the province of Quebec: The company has its headquarters in Montreal. Montreal gets a lot of snow between December and March. I grew up in Montréal and I speak Québécois French.
More examplesFewer examplesThere's so much to do, that's why I love Montreal!She graduated in political science from McGill university in Montreal.Their new player is a Montreal native.
